title: A New Era for PlayStation?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.01.24
description:
Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:10 - Housekeeping
 - A new Game Showdown went up on Friday featuring Alanah Pearce, Ben Starr, and Abu Salim. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
         -  The Roper Report   -
00:09:55 - Sony president Hiroki Totoki officially begins his role as interim CEO of PlayStation
00:28:03 - PlayStation Boss Jim Ryan Reveals PS2 Sold 160 Million Units Worldwide
00:34:45 - Nobuo Uematsu will compose the main theme for Final Fantasy 7 Remake trilogy’s final game
00:47:17 - The next Like a Dragon will not be Yakuza Kiwami 3, casting auditions to begin soon
00:49:07 - Tekken 8 Director Responds to the Many Fans Asking for a Waffle House Level
00:52:40 - Wee News!
00:53:34 - SuperChats
01:00:58 - You‘re Wrong
